comment:
Had the chance to try this at a Duncan Taylor tasting. One of my favorites of the night, very tropical. Distilled at Bushmills


Nose: Vanilla, Banana, Coconut, Mango, Passion Fruit, Caramel, Citrus, Floral, Pear

Palate: Vanilla, Passion Fruit, Mango, Coffee, Pepper, Oak

Finish: Mango, Citrus, Passion Fruit, Pepper, Caramel, Peach, Oak
